references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High Definition Video Generation with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-definition video generation model using diffusion models, which is a significant advancement in the field and directly relevant to the current research on long video generation.

references.paper_title: FIFO-Diffusion: Generating Infinite Videos from Text without Training
references.reason: This paper proposes FIFO-Diffusion, a novel tuning-free long video generation method that is directly compared and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: FreeNoise: Tuning-Free Longer Video Diffusion via Noise Rescheduling
references.reason: This paper introduces FreeNoise, another tuning-free long video generation approach, which serves as a baseline for comparison and analysis in the current research.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter2: Overcoming Data Limitations for High-Quality Video Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper presents VideoCrafter2, a high-quality video diffusion model that is used as the backbone model in the current research, making it a crucial component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: This paper introduces VBench, a benchmark used to evaluate the performance of different video generation models, providing a standard for comparing and evaluating the results of the current work.
